description:
Unifonic is a leading customer engagement platform and Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) provider based in the Middle East. It uses conversational AI technology to streamline omnichannel communication and revolutionize customer experiences for businesses.
Unifonicâ€™s solutions empower organizations to manage all their customer communication channels, including text, voice, WhatsApp, and web, from a single platform. This helps businesses to create stronger customer relationships while minimizing communication infrastructure costs.

Unifonic specializes in connecting local enterprises with their customers, including leading banks, financial institutions, and government entities throughout the region, as well as healthcare, retail, e-commerce, and transport and logistics providers worldwide.

With proven expertise in serving emerging markets since 2006, Unifonic safely handles over 10 billion annual transactions for millions of recipients across 160 countries. 
Unifonicâ€™s commitment to service excellence is backed by a local corporate presence in six countries and a dedicated team of over 400 professionals serving clients 24/7.

For additional information about Unifonic, please visit their website at
https://www.unifonic.com/.
description_enriched: Unifonic is a company that provides AI-driven solutions to elevate customer engagement. They offer a range of products and services including SMS, WhatsApp, webchat, messenger, and push notifications. They cater to various industries such as department, marketing, it & operations, customer service, industry, retail & e-commerce, government, transport & logistics, healthcare, banking & payments, and resources.

Thank you to all who joined our Customer Advisory Board in Dubai!
Your insights are helping us redefine customer experience with the power of AI.
company_updates.reshared_post_author_headline: Building one platform for every conversation at Unifonic
company_updates.reshared_post_description:
At Unifonic, we understand that listening is essential for success. That's why we collaborate with our clients to shape the future of Customer experience together!

Last week, we had the pleasure of hosting our Customer Advisory Board meeting, where we focused on the future of Customer Experience in both marketing and customer Care, as well as the role AI will play in transforming these experiences.

We want to extend our heartfelt thanks to all the participants who took the time to share their feedback, insights, and ideas, and who engaged in an open discussion about our roadmap. Together, we are making every experience more impactful and engaging.

Naif Bader Alharbi MBA,PMPÂ®
Ghadeer K. AlMugren
Nuha Abudurrah
Abdulrahman Almuzayil
Abdullah Almushayqih
Dr. Sami Al-Yazidi, Ph.D, PMP, CIB, ITIL, SCJP
Hesham Shoula , MBA
Mohannad AlSalmi

Saudi Electricity Company
Tawuniya

company_updates.reshared_post_description:
At Unifonic, we understand that listening is essential for success. That's why we collaborate with our clients to shape the future of Customer experience together!

Last week, we had the pleasure of hosting our Customer Advisory Board meeting, where we focused on the future of Customer Experience in both marketing and customer Care, as well as the role AI will play in transforming these experiences.

We want to extend our heartfelt thanks to all the participants who took the time to share their feedback, insights, and ideas, and who engaged in an open discussion about our roadmap. Together, we are making every experience more impactful and engaging.
